description: standing youth wearing heavy draperies--cloak over long skirt; figure seen from PL, gesturing
markings: URC, stamped in black: unidentified stamp (cluster of grapes?)
medium: Black and white chalk over gray wash on gray paper
provenance: 'Cardinal Leopoldo de' Medici, Lugt 2712 (1617-1675), Florence; by descent to his nephew Cosimo III de' Medici (1642-1723), Florence. [Pietro Scarpa, Venice; sold to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (by 1973-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Drapery Study of a Young Man
